committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to withdraw the National Wilderness Preservation System and other lands from operation of the general mining and mineral leasing laws.

summary.text: Wilderness Protection Act of 1981 - Withdraws lands within the national forest system designated as wilderness or wilderness study areas and lands recommended for wilderness designation or further planning from appropriation or disposition under the mining and mineral leasing laws.

titles.title: A bill to withdraw the National Wilderness Preservation System and other lands from operation of the general mining and mineral leasing laws.
